plan.title: Plan - GenAI Marketing Tools
plan.description: Research, analyze, and strategize with AI-powered market research, audience intelligence, and competitive analysis tools. These solutions help marketers make data-driven decisions and develop winning strategies.
plan.longDescription: The Plan category includes AI tools that help marketers make better decisions before execution. Market Research tools surface trends and insights. Audience Intelligence platforms identify customer segments, behaviors, and intent signals. Competitive Analysis tools track competitors and shifts in positioning, spend, and messaging. AI Assistants act as on-demand analysts for planning, hypotheses, and next-best actions.

create.title: Create - GenAI Marketing Tools
create.description: Generate compelling content with AI-powered creative tools for ads, copy, landing pages, and social media. These tools help marketers produce high-quality content faster and at scale.
create.longDescription: The Create category includes AI tools that speed up and standardize content production across channels. Ad Creative tools generate and iterate on ad variations. Copywriting & SEO platforms produce search- and conversion-optimized copy. Landing Page builders enable rapid page creation and testing. Social & Influencer tools support creator discovery, content ideation, and repurposing.

activate.title: Activate - GenAI Marketing Tools
activate.description: Launch and manage campaigns with AI-powered activation tools for campaign management, email, ad platforms, and personalized shopping experiences. These tools help marketers reach customers efficiently.
activate.longDescription: The Activate category includes AI tools that power go-to-market execution and performance. Campaign Management platforms automate setup, monitoring, and optimization across channels. Email & Outreach tools personalize messaging and follow-ups at scale. AI Ad Platforms support smarter media buying through automated targeting, bidding, and budget pacing. Shopping Assistants enable conversational product discovery and recommendations, bridging marketing and commerce.

measure.title: Measure - GenAI Marketing Tools
measure.description: Track, analyze, and optimize with AI-powered measurement tools for attribution, analytics, and GenAI visibility. These tools help marketers understand performance and make data-driven improvements.
measure.longDescription: The Measure category includes AI tools for understanding and improving marketing performance. Attribution platforms assign credit across customer touchpoints. Analytics tools surface actionable insights and predict trends. GenAI Visibility (GEO) tools monitor how your brand appears in AI-powered search, answers, and recommendations.

general.title: General - GenAI Marketing Tools
general.description: Versatile AI tools that work across categories and subcategories for specific workflows and broader business applications beyond traditional marketing.
general.longDescription: The General category includes GenAI tools that cut across multiple marketing disciplines. These multi-purpose platforms support Plan, Create, Activate, and Measure workflows, spanning both specific use cases and broader business applications. From general-purpose AI assistants to cross-functional automation and workflow tools, these solutions provide flexibility across teams and contexts.
